description.name: usdcsol
description.tagline: USDC Solana Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto sol-usdc Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept USDC Solana directly on your website
Unique sol/usdc receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your sol/usdc wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
